title: Chain Upgrade
summary: This is v0.24 software upgrade for the Synternet Mainnet
details:
If this upgrade proposal passes, the new Synternet Chain application binary v.0.24.0 will become the current blockchain version. Synternet Chain node operators must have already prepared the correct binary before the Synternet Chain halts and be ready to launch it after the Synternet Chain halts. For more information on deploying and managing validator binaries: https://docs.synternet.com/docs/for-validators/Mainnet/becoming-a-validator.

This upgrade proposal adds a few key improvements:
- Functionality to burn coins, which is necessary for upcoming burn proposal.
- A new pay-per-message pricing, which is necessary for proper economy of AI agents.
vote_option_context: Voting positively will halt the chain at proposed height and require running v0.24.0 binary. Voting negatively will postpone the upgrade.
